title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 720-1.2 - Exceptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 720-1.2 - Exceptions

State Regulations

This Part does not apply to: (a) a contract between a municipality, an
electric, gas or a steam corporation, and State, municipal, or Federal
authorities, under which electricity, gas, or steam is furnished for State, municipal, or Federal use and not for resale; (b) a contract between telephone
corporations; or
(c) a contract for
the sale of water by a waterworks corporation to State, municipal, or Federal
authorities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
720-1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
